Package babble.net.http

Asynchrnous HTTP protocol.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultGet
    Streams a resource of a given HTTP GET request path as response.
    HttpClient
    A Client using JSON-RPC protocol.
    HttpConstants
    Set of constants declarations related to HTTP protocol.
    HttpProtocol  
    HttpRequest
    A HTTP request.
    HttpResponse
    A response according to HTTP specification.
    HttpRoute
    An HTTP route processes a request to generate a response.
    HttpRouter
    A router for HTTP request that matches path to an operation.
    HttpServer  

Package babble.net.http Description

Asynchrnous HTTP protocol. Communicates via HTTPRequest and HTTPResponse that are compliant to HTTP specification
